-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Geohash latitudes and longitudes.
--   
--   Implements the geohash algorithm described here:
--   <a>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geohash</a>
@package geohash
@version 1.0.1


-- | Compute geohashes as per <a>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Geohash</a>.
module Data.Geohash

-- | Encode a geohash from the given <tt>(lat, lon)</tt> pair with the
--   given precision.
--   
--   <pre>
--   encode 10 (37.775, -122.419)
--   </pre>
encode :: (Fractional a, Ord a) => Int -> (a, a) -> Maybe String

-- | Decode a geohash into a <tt>(lat, lon)</tt> pair.
--   
--   <pre>
--   decode "9q8yyk9pqd"
--   </pre>
decode :: Fractional a => String -> Maybe (a, a)

-- | Decode a geohash into ranges of latitude &amp; longitude. This
--   reflects the precision of the decode and can be used to construct a
--   bounding box.
--   
--   <pre>
--   decode_ "9q8yyk9pqd"
--   </pre>
decode_ :: Fractional a => String -> Maybe ((a, a), (a, a))
